sentences.cn: 一连串不幸的事发生了.

sentences.en: Gratiano mischance ; the cry is very direful.
sentences.cn: 葛 莱西 安诺出了什麽乱子啦?这叫声很是凄惨.

sentences.en: I lost your file by pure mischance.
sentences.cn: 我把你的文件丢了,纯粹是碰上倒霉事了.

sentences.en: If by some mischance the government get elected again, I think taxes will rise.
sentences.cn: 如果不幸这届政府再次当选，我想税收会提高。

sentences.en: It's an infernal mischance; I've done my best to discourage it.
sentences.cn: 这真是倒楣透顶的事; 我尽量地泼冷水.

sentences.en: Oh, wretched I, to whom this mischance is happened!
sentences.cn: 我是不幸的, 因为这事对我发生了.

sentences.en: Only a serious mischance will prevent him from arriving tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 只有碰上极倒霉的意外变故,他明天才会来不了.

sentences.en: Only a serious mischance will prevent them from getting there in time tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 只有发生严重的意外才会使他们明天不能及时到达那里.

sentences.en: Their intrusion, though baffling and terrible , is not a random mischance.
sentences.cn: 他们的闯入, 虽然使人惊疑不定,却并不是飞来横祸.

trans.tran_en: bad luck, or a situation that results from bad luck
